title: Why Facebook Stock Is Compelling on Coronavirus Weakness
text:
Facebook stock is a high-quality, long-term winner, trading at a huge discount because of temporary headwinds, which will pass in a few months. 
The post Why Facebook Stock Is Compelling on Coronavirus Weakness appeared first on InvestorPlace.

title: Facebook (FB) Adds WhatsApp Coronavirus Fact Checker in Italy
text: Facebook (FB) adds coronavirus fact checker on its WhatsApp platform in Italy to counter coronavirus misinformation.
